item.title: Kool & The Gang - Cherish
item.description:
Let’s take
a walk together
Near the ocean shore
hand in hand you and I
Let’s cherish
every moment
We have been given
for time is passing by
I often pray
before I lay down
By your side
if you receive
Your calling
before I awake
Could I make it
through the night
Cherish the love
we have
We should cherish
the life we live
Cherish the love
cherish the life

cherish the love

we have

we both shall live
